筄字的基本解释

筄
yào
铺在房屋椽上瓦下的席。
屋栋。

筄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yào］
［《廣韻》弋照切，去笑，以。］
(1)铺在椽上瓦下用以防漏的竹席或苇席。
(2)用同“珓”。占卜用具。

筄字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筄； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页882第15
【廣韻】弋照切【集韻】弋笑切，?音燿。【爾雅·釋宮】屋上薄謂之筄。【註】屋笮也。　又【集韻】餘招切，音遙。【類篇】夷周切。義?同。

筄字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
筄字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
yào
The mats spread under the roof tiles on the house rafters.
House building.
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yào］
["Guangyun" Yi according to the cut, to laugh, to. ]
(1) Bamboo mats or reed mats laid under the tiles on the rafters to prevent leakage.
(2) Use the same as "珓". Divination equipment.
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　筄; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 882 15
[Guang Yun] Yi Zhao cut [Ji Yun] Yi Xiao cut,? Yin Yao. 【Erya·Shigong】The house is thin called Zhiyan. [Note] House Ruo also.　[Jiyun] I move and cut, sound away. 【Classes】Early cut. Righteous? Same.
